long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
By clicking  "add to Chrome" , I accept and agree to installing the seek-me extension and setting Chrome new tab to that provided by the service and Terms of Use https://seek-me.com/terms.php and Policy https://seek-me.com/privacy.php
The extension will update your search settings and will change your new tab and default search provider to Microsoft Bing .

Introducing Seek-me, the must-have Chrome extension for search and inspiration. With Seek-me, you can quickly and effortlessly find the information you need, saving you valuable time.

Using our voice commands, you can navigate the web even faster. Simply press the action 
(Alt + V) button and use commands like "search for [your query]" to find exactly what you're looking for without lifting a finger. You can also use commands like "go to Facebook" or "go to YouTube", "go to Gmail" to easily access your favorite websites.

But Seek-me isn't just about search; it's about inspiration too. Our extension offers a variety of beautiful background images and inspiring quotes from some of history's greatest minds. These quotes and images are designed to awaken your motivation and stimulate your imagination, helping you focus on your goals and achieve them.

With our shortcuts, you can easily access the most popular websites and return to Seek-me quickly when you're on another page. And if you have any questions, our team is here to help, keeping you posted within two days.

Upgrade your Chrome browser with Seek-me today and get ready for a daily dose of motivation and beauty, all with the convenience of voice commands.

More info about our extension : https://seek-me.com/description.php
